title: Mount Everest: Rescue under way after hundreds trapped on Tibetan slopes
description: Two days of unusually heavy snow and rainfall have hit the Himalayas during a Chinese national holiday stranding hikers eager to see the eastern face of the world’s highest mountain.
content:
'The weather this year is not normal'
October marks one of the year's peak hiking seasons for Everest and its surrounding areas, when the temperature is known to be forgiving and skies are clear.
But this year, hikers and guides were caught off guard... [1931 chars]

title: Conservatives to announce £5,000 tax rebate for young homebuyers
description: Speaking at the party's conference, Shadow chancellor Mel Stride will say the proposal will be funded by cuts to public spending worth £47bn.

title: Trump sends California troops to Portland after court denies order
description: The move appears aimed at circumventing an order barring the deployment of National Guard troops in Oregon.
content:
US President Donald Trump has sent troops from California to Oregon after a court denied his attempt to deploy the National Guard in Portland.
The deployment circumvents a judge's order blocking the deployment by instead using National Guard soldiers... [3729 chars]

title: Why time matters for Tory MPs deciding Kemi Badenoch's future
description: For many Tory MPs looking at Kemi Badenoch's leadership, they are already wondering how much more time she needs to turn around the party's fortunes.
